Name: Naranja Daiquiri
Ingredients: 45 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
22.5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
3 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of ¼ orange wheel slice on rim.
Review: An Orange Daiquiri with orange juice notes amplified by cognac orange liqueur.
History: Pronounced 'Na-Rahn-ha' (or thereabouts), Naranja is Spanish for 'orange', both the fruit and the colour.
Nutrition: One serving of Naranja Daiquiri contains 188 calories
